verbs.description: For the price of Trump ’s tax cuts , the government [V: could] wipe out all student debt — and increase economic growth by $ 860 billion .
[ARGM-ADV: For the price of Trump ’s tax cuts] , [ARG0: the government] [ARGM-MOD: could] [V: wipe] out [ARG1: all student debt] — and increase economic growth by $ 860 billion .
[ARG3: For the price of Trump ’s tax cuts] , [ARG0: the government] [ARGM-MOD: could] wipe out all student debt — and [V: increase] [ARG1: economic growth] [ARG2: by $ 860 billion] .
